name: Paper Cutter (itch)
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 37 Compo with Unity, GIMP, and Bfxer.

A 2D fighting game. You play as an oragami swordsman fending off paper monsters. Swipe your sword repeatedly and the level rotates.

Controls

W: Jump

A/D: Move left/right

S: Fast fall

Left click/left arrow: Attack left

Right click/right arrow: Attack right

Objective

Attack enemies to throw them. Throw them into a different colored wall to destroy them. Destroy enough enemies of each color to win.

Enemies will try to bite you and take away one of your 4 lives. Lose all 4 and you die.
